_header: Christ that would all men redeem and buy
_description: The hymn ‘Criste redemptor omnium’ — six stanzas rhyme royal

BLAdd34193.First Lines:
Criste that wold all men reydeme and byeOff þe fadyr al only
                    generate…
BLAdd34193.Last Lines:
…Wyth perfytt mynd and all solempniteThys dey thys fest of
                    þi natiuite
BLAdd34193.Editions:
Patterson,  Frank A. 
             The Middle English Penitential Lyric.
Columbia University Studies in English.
         New York: Columbia Press, 1911: 15-17.
Patterson,  Frank A. 
             “Hymnal from MS. Additional 34193, British Museum.” 
             Medieval Studies in Memory of Gertrude Schoepperle Loomis.
            Roger Sherman Loomis, ed. 
         New York: Columbia UP, 1927: 443-88: 455-7.
